title: [Large-scale] Serverless-Based Machine Learning Design and Training Framework Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts, cloud computing experience, and Python programming proficiency
context.additional_context: Course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen competencies in developing and optimizing machine learning models in serverless environments

learning_goals: Analyze characteristics of machine learning workflows in serverless architecture and derive design constraints.
Establish dynamic resource allocation strategies by applying the scheduling mechanism of the SMLT framework.
Design efficient model training processes under custom deadlines and budget constraints.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
